author: sky.cactus
content: This isn't the right server for speculation.

author: trent_vanepps
content: it's very hard to project this, given the large number of variables. a large number of L2s settling onto mainnet may actually increase the average gas price as they compete between each other for blockspace to settle large numbers of tx for their users.

author: nintendox1856
content: Thanks, response. Btw mr.V talked about the importance of L2 in the game economies, so hopefully, it will be good enough and reasonoable

author: tas6697
content: Hey all, I'm working with some folks in the enterprise space to form a working group to define standards (including but not limited to interoperability) for L2, with an emphasis on (but not limited to) enterprise use cases.  We've reached out to many of the L2 projects, but also wanted to get the word out to researchers or others who may be interested!
